attributes.additional_details: Sepp Blatter (President of World football governing body) has said on Twitter that racism on the field of play can be ended with a handshake. This view is outrageous and he should resign. Our aim is to get the F.A involved into helping him leave as this type of role model is not good enough to represent the World in terms of Football and in general as many children will grow up listening to his views all around the World!
